data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Beihai access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Beihai, Guangxi, China

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Beihai to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.section_summary: On average, 46 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Beihai, Guangxi, China.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 361,000 souls in Beihai and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Beihai, Guangxi, China, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Father, 0.4% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the county of Beihai.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, move the 27,386 believers in the county of Beihai to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: There are 361,000 people living in the county of Beihai. Only about 27,386 might be believers.
